mutants.code:
from itertools import combinations

def sum_of_two_digits(num):
    digits_list = list(map(int, str(num)))
    sums = [sum(comb) for comb in combinations(digits_list, 3)]
    return sums

from itertools import combinations

def sum_of_two_digits(num):
    digits_list = list(map(int, str(num)))
    sums = [sum(comb) for comb in combinations(digits_list, 1)]
    return sums

    digits_list = list(map(int, str(num)))

    return sums

from itertools import combinations

def sum_of_two_digits(num):
    digits_list = list(map(int, str(num)))
    sums = [sum(comb) for comb in combinations(digits_list, -2)]
    return sums
